description: This file defines a Spring Boot REST controller for managing products, exposing CRUD endpoints such as list, get by id, create, update, and delete.

classes.name: ProductController
classes.description: Spring REST controller handling CRUD operations for products with endpoints mapped to /products.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve all products.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Handles GET requests with an ID parameter to retrieve a specific product.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new product.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT requests with an ID parameter to update an existing product.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests with an ID parameter to delete a product.
